mapper.sql: p.uuid as uuid, p.kee as kee, p.name as name, p.private as isPrivate, p.description as description, p.qualifier as qualifier, p.organization_uuid as organizationUuid, null as authUuid

p.uuid as uuid, p.kee as kee, p.name as name, p.private as isPrivate, p.description as description, p.organization_uuid as organizationUuid, case when p.parent_uuid is null then 'VW' else 'SVW' end as qualifier, case when p.root_uuid != p.uuid then p.root_uuid else null end as authUuid
mapper.select: (select from projects p where p.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) UNION (select from portfolios p where p.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
